name: Super Mario Sunshine CO-OP
overview: Super Mario Sunshine is a game about beating Mario's imposter... But as every mate of a crew knows you can't finish such a big task alone. That's why this mod allows for a second Mario to log in, and become player 2! There is split screen and a minimalistic options menu. It runs on every GameCube running platform (Dolphin Emu, Wii, GameCube...).
